title: [1.6.4-1.11]YALSM - Yet Another Leather Smelting Mod / 冶炼皮革[汉化]
author: _DIM_
txt_content:
本帖最后由 酷车手BB弹 于 2017-3-18 23:02 编辑 

介绍Adds a crafting recipe that allows you to craft 5x Rotten Flesh into 1x Patchwork Flesh, and a smelting recipe that allows you to smelt Patchwork Flesh into Leather. Experience gained from smelting is 0.35, equivalent to cooking raw beef into steak.
Also optionally (disabled by default) adds a single smelting recipe that allows you to smelt Rotten Flesh directly into Leather.Experience gained from smelting is the minimum allowed (0.1, same as Cobblestone --> Stone).Turn this on in YALSM.cfg if you want it.
Versions for 1.8 and above need airbreathercore.
If you're on Forge 1.9, check the Forge build number to figure out what version I'm officially supporting (this matters more for airbreathercore, and mainly just if you use YAFM too, but nonetheless this is how I've tested it):  Builds 1804 and below require no higher than version 2.1.5 of YALSM, and no higher than 1.0.1 of airbreathercore. Builds 1805 and above (tested up to 1865) require no lower than version 2.1.6 of YALSM, and no lower than 1.0.2 of airbreathercore.
大致翻译如下5个腐肉可合成一个湿皮革湿皮革烧制后进化为皮革广大不喜爱杀害小动物的朋友的好伴侣forge版本在1804以下的请不要使用超过2.1.5的YALSM前置也不能超过1.0.1forge版本在1805以上的请不要使用低于2.1.6的YALSM前置也不能低于1.0.2
